revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 56:;tax on land plots in release likewise drachmas 2 obols 3.5, surcharges obols 3 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obol 1 chalki 2;;tax on revenue from rent for the 12th year drachmas 20, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 21 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;And Longinia Ptolemais;;naubion for lots in release for the 13th year drachma 1 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 4;;Euhemeros, son of Euhemeros, grandson of Keras, mother Tauris, drachmas 16;;Charis, daughter of Chairemon (of Heron, Arab archer);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3 chalki 2, naubion obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 5.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 3;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5, in total drachmas 10;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2.5;;in total for the day drachmas 192 obols 14.;(Pharmouthi) 20 likewise:;Ptolemaios, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thases, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tauris, obols 28;;Heras, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, drachmas 16;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tapasion, obols 28;;Esouris, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Paouites, son of Petheus, grandson of Phaseis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Phaseis, grandson of Esouris, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 60 obols 27.;(Pharmouthi) 21 likewise:;Artemis, daughter of Ammonios (Orsenouphis (auloi-player));;(in left margin: to Sarap(), drachmas 20 obols 7) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 4 obol 0.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3.5, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 4.5, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 9 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 10 obol 1, surcharges obols 4, in total drachmas 10 obols 5;;Sambous, daughter of Petheus (Kames, son of Elekis);;(in left margin: to Sarap() drachmas 8 obols 8) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obol 4, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4, obols 2.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
